OH DAMN you just got LUCKY!  If you are looking at reviews for tapas and a GOOD TIME then you have found the spot.  This place is great but can be packed - be ready to stand and order over the lucky people who have scored a seat at the bar (odd at first but not intimidating).  There are shallow standing tables against the wall in this skinny but long/deep establishment.  The service is great, the atmosphere is fun (we met people from 3 different countries) and the food is great!  If you only speak/read English then get a menu it has the translations.  From the cheese to the anchovies to the peppers this place is solid.   The next time we are in Gracia we will definitively be back at least once if not more.
